summary: This is an email exchange from November 30, 2018, discussing a lawsuit in Palm Beach County Circuit Court. An attorney who represented multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein is suing Epstein for malicious prosecution, alleging Epstein previously sued the attorney in retaliation for representing victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email discussion; being sued by an attorney for malicious prosecution, with the allegation that Epstein previously sued the attorney in retaliation for representing Epstein's victims.

persons.name: Attorney
persons.role: Plaintiff in malicious prosecution lawsuit against Epstein
persons.context: An attorney who represented multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein; previously sued by Epstein, now suing Epstein for malicious prosecution claiming the prior suit was wrongful retaliation.

persons.name: Law Partner
persons.context: The law partner of the attorney suing Epstein was convicted of fraud related to an Epstein business; this conviction was cited in Epstein's prior lawsuit against the attorney.

connections.description: Attorney is suing Epstein for malicious prosecution; previously, Epstein sued the attorney.
The attorney and the law partner were colleagues; the partner's fraud conviction was used by Epstein in a prior lawsuit against the attorney.
The law partner's fraud conviction was related to an Epstein business.

events.title: Scheduled trial date
events.description: A trial was scheduled for December 4, 2018, in the malicious prosecution lawsuit filed by an attorney against Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein's prior lawsuit against attorney
events.description: Epstein previously sued the attorney, claiming the attorney was involved in a fraud related to an Epstein business for which the attorney's law partner was convicted.

events.title: Attorney files malicious prosecution lawsuit
events.description: The attorney filed a lawsuit against Epstein for malicious prosecution, alleging Epstein's prior lawsuit was wrongful and filed in retaliation for the attorney representing Epstein's victims.

keyFacts: An attorney who represented multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein is suing Epstein for malicious prosecution in Palm Beach County Circuit Court.
The attorney alleges Epstein previously sued him in retaliation for representing Epstein's victims, with Epstein's suit claiming the attorney was involved in a fraud related to an Epstein business.
The fraud in the prior case involved the attorney's law partner, who was convicted.
A trial in this malicious prosecution case was scheduled for December 4, 2018.
